short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension for Travel Agents to get GDS codes from ITA Matrix Flights. Powered by Basis.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Basis GDS Extractor - Your personal GDS code generator for seamless flight bookings. This Chrome extension instantly converts ITA Matrix itineraries into customised VI* format codes, tailored to your specific CRM system.
Key Features:
	•	Automatic parsing of ITA Matrix flight data
	•	Customisable VI* output based on your CRM requirements
	•	Time-saving one-click conversion
	•	CRM-compatible output
Perfect for travel agents who need efficient, error-free transfer of flight details from ITA Matrix to their booking systems. Eliminate manual code construction and streamline your workflow with personalised GDS commands that work seamlessly with your CRM platform.
Register today to customise your VI* format and maximise your booking efficiency!
